I picked up my guitar and started playing.

participant_2.background:
I'm exhausted from driving 300 miles a week for work.
My family is very supportive of my dream to be an actor.
and , my best friend is cayden.
i am 5 3 and am the shortest person in my family.
my parents are distant.

content.text: Not much, exhausted from driving 300 miles a week for work.
Oh no that sucks, what do you do for work?
I am a driver for a company that delivers goods.
Oh thats cool, I do music and I am an actor.
Oh thats really cool! Do you enjoy it?
I love it, its my passion.
Thats great! My parents are really supportive of my dream to be an actor.
Thats awesome! My parents are distant, they don't really support my music or acting.
Oh thats too bad, do you have any siblings?
I have one brother, but he is not supportive either.
Oh thats too bad, well at least you have your best friend to support you.
Yes, I do! My best friend is cayden, we've been friends since we were little.
That's great! I'm glad you have someone to support you.
Thanks! You seem like a really cool person, we should hang out sometime.
Yeah that would be great! I'm free this weekend, are you?
Yes I am! I'll send you a message so we can plan something.
